quote: An associate producer is the only guy in Hollywood who will associate with a producer.
Hollywood didn't kill Marilyn Monroe, it's the Marilyn Monroes who are killing Hollywood.
Hollywood grew to be the most flourishing factory of popular mythology since the Greeks.
Hollywood has always been a cage... a cage to catch our dreams.
Hollywood is a place where people from Iowa mistake each other for stars.
Hollywood money isn't money. It's congealed snow, melts in your hand, and there you are.
I was the highest-priced and most important star in Hollywood, but I was 'difficult.'
I'm impressed with the people from Chicago. Hollywood is hype, New York is talk, Chicago is work.
An associate producer is the only guy in Hollywood who will associate with a producer.
Hollywood didn't kill Marilyn Monroe, it's the Marilyn Monroes who are killing Hollywood.
Hollywood grew to be the most flourishing factory of popular mythology since the Greeks.
Hollywood has always been a cage... a cage to catch our dreams.
Hollywood is a place where people from Iowa mistake each other for stars.
Hollywood money isn't money. It's congealed snow, melts in your hand, and there you are.
I was the highest-priced and most important star in Hollywood, but I was 'difficult.'
I'm impressed with the people from Chicago. Hollywood is hype, New York is talk, Chicago is work.
In Hollywood all the marriages are happy, it's trying to live together afterwards that causes all the problems.
In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
Strip away the phony tinsel of Hollywood and you will find the real tinsel underneath.
The classy gangster is a Hollywood invention.
The only reason I'm in Hollywood is that I don't have the moral courage to refuse the money.
Where is Hollywood located? Chiefly between the ears. In that part of the American brain lately vacated by God.
